snippet: Another massive seizure of ivory. Unfortunately, significant amounts of seized ivory "leak" back into the illegal market and despite 17 massive hauls last year; almost no arrests have been made.
abstract: Another massive seizure of ivory. Unfortunately, significant amounts of seized ivory "leak" back into the illegal market and despite 17 massive hauls last year; almost no arrests have been made.

headline.main: Illegal Ivory Gets Seized, but Few People Are Punished
